attributes.action: understand that the so-called abuse of parliamentary expenses by members of parliament is in fact corruption in public office, and all those members of parliament who have claimed for expenses that did not exist should be referred to the Metropolitan Police with a view to bringing criminal charges for theft of public funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. If you have concerns about the legality of any claims we suggest you contact the police directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
